Job Title: Operator, Refinery

Location: Council Bluffs, IA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Location : Council Bluffs IA OPD

City : Council Bluffs

State : Iowa (US-IA)

Country : United States (US)

Requisition Number : 34442

 Position Summary: 

The Bunge North America Council Bluffs, IA location is looking for a Refinery Oil Load Out Operator to work in North America’s largest soybean processing/refining plant. The candidate will need to be able to work in a safe, team environment and have the ability to work a rotating shift. Health and welfare benefits begin on date of hire. Starting pay for this role is $26.74/hr

 Core Functions: 

 Must actively participate in Bunge’s Employee Safety Involvement Plan  Maintain a safe work environment for one’s self and all employees  Refinery Control Room processes include Deodorization, Refined/Bleached, Hydrogenation, and Gas Plant; Cross training - it is expected that individuals train and learn to run each of these processes  Oil Load Out processes includes loading rail cars and trucks for shipment of oil products, and unloading rail cars and trucks of crude soybean and cottonseed oil  Operate and control Refinery oil processing equipment/machines while following the set production schedule; make adjustments and maintain operating parameters to meet or exceed customer expectations  Maintain waste water parameters  Collect tank and production stream samples of oil products for lab analysis  Follow GMPs (Good Manufacturing Practices) and maintain the cleanliness of processing area  Must be highly motivated and be able to work without constant supervision  Perform all other duties as assigned

Skill/Experience Requirements: 

 High School diploma or GED equivalent required  Demonstrated ability to work in a team environment  Demonstrated ability to work in a safety conscious environment  Some mechanical background including the ability to recognize signs of operational failure  Good written and verbal communications skills  Must be willing and able to work rotating shift  Overtime will be required both as part of the normal schedule and to provide coverage as needed. 

Bunge (NYSE: BG) is a world leader in sourcing, processing and supplying oilseed and grain products and ingredients. Founded in 1818, Bunge’s expansive network feeds and fuels a growing world, creating sustainable products and opportunities for more than 70,000 farmers and the consumers they serve across the globe. The company is headquartered in St. Louis, Missouri and has 25,000 employees worldwide who stand behind more than 350 port terminals, oilseed processing plants, grain facilities, and food and ingredient production and packaging facilities around the world.

Bunge is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, transgender status, national origin, citizenship, age, disability or military or veteran status, or any other legally protected status. Bunge is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Minorities/Women/Veterans/Disabled

Experience Level (if available): Associate
